# lark Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "lark" {
  app_id     = "app_id"
  app_secret = "app_secret"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `app_id` (String, Sensitive) The App ID for authenticating with Lark API
- `app_secret` (String, Sensitive) The App Secret for authenticating with Lark API
